Actions.Name: Spear
Actions.Effect: No ranged attack penalties for adjacent foes. If attacking an adjacent foe, deals bonus damage.

Actions.Name: Backflip
Actions.Description: The Harpooner dashes 1. If there is an adjacent foe, increase this dash to 3, and shove that foe 1.

Actions.Name: Net
Actions.Description: The Harpooner creates a net terrain effect in a free space range 6. The net space is treated as a pit.

Actions.Name: Main Harpoon
Actions.Description: A foe in range 6 must save or take 2[D]+[fray], become shattered, and be shoved until adjacent to the Harpooner. On a success, the foe takes [D]+[fray] and is shoved 1 towards the harpooner instead.
